pullRequest.title: added hashCode and equals method to StringListType to fix object comparison

added hashCode and equals method to StringListType to fix object comparison

nodes.bodyText: I think the property typeDetails never will be null as every constructor assigns some value to it. Furthermore it would be possible to add the final keyword to the typeDetails definition in line 36.
